channel.title: PNPC Command

item.title: PNPC Command
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

Iâ€™m Trying to make a command turn a player into a certain NPC,
I Already have the PNPC command in my server, But how do I make a command that turns you into a certain npc and does the correct animation?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("santaself")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(5)); c.npcId2 = newNPC; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 200000 && newNPC >= 0) { c.npcId2 = newNPC; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); } else { c.sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

Read full topic
